name: workspace
description: A modern full-stack online store application built with React (TypeScript) frontend and FastAPI (Python) backend, using SQLite database.

scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.setup: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python seed_data.py
scripts.seed: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python seed_data.py
